EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-01-09 Takeaways on Gartner Conference 2018.ES-2018-12-29 Non MQL WBN In
EmailTemplate.subject: Win a $100 Amazon Gift Card - Gartner Cloud Strategies Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4wvAAA]]> Join Turbonomic for our Gartner IOCS 2018 Takeaways Webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4wvAAA]]> on Wednesday, January 9th at 11 a.m. ET. You'll receive a concise summary of megatrends discussed at the conference, cloud-related calls to action, and recommendations for Gartner research articles that will help you formulate and drive your cloud strategies.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4wvAAA]]>
During the 30-minute live webinar, we'll discuss:
- Top learnings from Gartner IOCS - What they mean for you and your team - What to expect in 2019
See you there! Regards, Andrew PS. If you can't make it live, sign up anyways. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4wvAAA]]> You'll be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card and I'll send you the recording afterward.
